td.div:
StratML Part 1 to Part 2 XForm
Sharing organizational strategies and directions

span.b: URLS to try: Part 1 or Part 2

p.div:
This XML Form (XForm) provides an easy way to create Part 2 StratML files or convert Part 1 files into the Part 2 format.
Part 2 files (which will be available at legisworks.org/StratML/XML can be re-imported into this form.
Save the XML file you create here to your hard drive for further editing with your XML editor.
The XML and XML+XSL buttons will also store the latest version of the StratML file at legisworks.org/StratML/XML using
the Plan's Name and Organization/Identifier in the file.
Part 2 files stored locally or stored outside of legisworks.org cannot be imported at this time.
